alert.note: Alert for Berkeley; Charleston (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 5:29PM EDT until July 04 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF CHARLESTON AND BERKELEY COUNTIES... At 529 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Goose Creek, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: North Charleston, Goose Creek, Hanahan, Naval Weapons Station Charleston, Ladson, and Daniel Island. This warning includes I-26 between mile markers 204 and 209. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
